subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Shammgod, who led the Friars to the round of 8 in 1997, is now an undergraduate assistant for the team and on track to graduate in May, 20 years after he first enrolled.
snippet: Shammgod, who led the Friars to the round of 8 in 1997, is now an undergraduate assistant for the team and on track to graduate in May, 20 years after he first enrolled.
